statements: SELECT * FROM policy_coverage_details;
SELECT policy_id, property_type, property_location, coverage_limit FROM policy_coverage_details;
SELECT property_type, coverage_limit FROM policy_coverage_details WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM policy_coverage_details WHERE coverage_limit > 5000;
SELECT property_type, property_location FROM policy_coverage_details WHERE property_type = 'Home';
SELECT * FROM policy_coverage_details WHERE coverage_limit > 1000 ORDER BY property_type DESC;
SELECT policy_id, property_type FROM policy_coverage_details WHERE property_location = 'New York' ORDER BY property_type ASC;
SELECT policy_id, property_type, coverage_limit FROM policy_coverage_details WHERE property_location LIKE 'Los Angeles%' AND coverage_limit BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000;
SELECT policy_id, property_location FROM policy_coverage_details WHERE property_type = 'Condo' OR property_type = 'Apartment' ORDER BY policy_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM policy_coverage_details WHERE coverage_limit < 5000 AND (property_type = 'House' OR property_type = 'Condo') ORDER BY coverage_limit DESC,policy_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM PolicyCoverageDetails;
SELECT policy_id, property_address FROM PolicyCoverageDetails WHERE coverage_limit > 1000;
SELECT coverage_name, limit FROM CoverageLimits WHERE limit >= 500;
SELECT property_address, coverage_limit FROM PolicyCoverageDetails WHERE policy_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM PolicyCoverageDetails WHERE property_address LIKE '%Main Street%';
SELECT * FROM PolicyCoverageDetails WHERE coverage_limit > 1000 ORDER BY policy_id DESC;
SELECT policy_id, property_address FROM PolicyCoverageDetails WHERE property_address LIKE '%Street' ORDER BY policy_id ASC;
SELECT policy_id, pcd.property_address, cl.coverage_name FROM PolicyCoverageDetails pcd INNER JOIN CoverageLimits cl ON pcd.coverage_limit = cl.limit WHERE pcd.coverage_limit < cl.limit;
SELECT policy_id, property_address, coverage_limit FROM PolicyCoverageDetails WHERE policy_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT COUNT(policy_id) AS Total_Policies, AVG(coverage_limit) AS Avg_Coverage_Limit FROM PolicyCoverageDetails;
SELECT * FROM policy_coverage_details
SELECT policy_id, property_type FROM policy_coverage_details
SELECT property_address, coverage_limit FROM policy_coverage_details
SELECT * FROM property_specifics
SELECT property_type, year_built FROM property_specifics
SELECT * FROM policy_coverage_details WHERE coverage_limit > 50000;
SELECT policy_id, property_type, property_address FROM policy_coverage_details WHERE property_type='House';
SELECT MAX(coverage_limit) AS max_coverage_limit FROM policy_coverage_details;
SELECT property_type, year_built, building_material FROM property_specifics WHERE year_built > 2000;
SELECT coverage_type, max_value FROM coverage_limits ORDER BY max_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM policy_coverage_details;
SELECT coverage_type, coverage_limits FROM policy_coverage_details;
SELECT ph.holder_name, pd.property_address FROM policy_holders ph JOIN property_details pd ON ph.policy_id = pd.property_id;
SELECT ch.date_effective, ch.date_expiry, pc.coverage_type FROM coverage_history ch JOIN policy_coverage_details pc ON ch.policy_id = pc.policy_id;
SELECT * FROM policy_holders WHERE holder_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM policy_coverage_details ORDER BY coverage_limits DESC;
SELECT policy_id, coverage_type, coverage_limits FROM policy_coverage_details WHERE coverage_limits > 5000;
SELECT DISTINCT policy_id, coverage_type FROM policy_coverage_details WHERE coverage_type IN ('Home Insurance', 'Auto Insurance');
SELECT holder_name AS holder, policy_id FROM policy_holders WHERE holder_address LIKE '%Ave%' ORDER BY holder_name ASC;

SELECT ph.holder_name, p.property_address, p.property_value FROM policy_holders AS ph INNER JOIN property_details AS p ON ph.policy_id = p.property_id WHERE p.property_value > 100000 ORDER BY p.property_value ASC;
SELECT * FROM policy_details;
SELECT property_address, coverage_type FROM policy_details WHERE coverage_limit > 1000;
SELECT policy_id, property_address, coverage_limit FROM policy_details WHERE coverage_type = 'home';
SELECT * FROM property_details ORDER BY property_value DESC;
SELECT property_id, property_type, property_owner FROM property_details WHERE property_type = 'apartment';
SELECT * FROM policy_details WHERE coverage_type = 'Home'
SELECT policy_id, coverage_limit FROM policy_details WHERE coverage_type = 'Auto'
SELECT property_address FROM policy_details WHERE coverage_type = 'Health' ORDER BY property_address DESC
SELECT * FROM property_details
SELECT property_type, property_value FROM property_details ORDER BY property_type ASC
